articles.title: Measure for treatment of ailing Kim Ryang Mu demanded
articles.content:
Measure for treatment of ailing Kim Ryang Mu demanded 
    Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Wife of Kim Ryang Mu, permanent vice-chairman of the south headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification (Pomminryon), demanded the authorities find out and punish those who brutally tortured her husband at the basement of the "Agency for National Security Planning" building in Hwajong-dong, Kwangju, in July 1997, according to a South Korean press report.
   Kim wants to be treated in the north but the authorities have avoided an answer to it, she said, strongly demanding the authorities take a measure to enable him to receive medical treatment as he wishes.

Korea, China cooperate in hydropower
articles.content:
Korea, China cooperate in hydropower 
    Beijing, December 18 (KCNA) -- A resolution of the 52nd meeting of the council of Korea-China Hydroelectric Power Company was signed in Beijing on Dec. 17.
   It was signed by vice-minister of power and coal industries of the DPRK Han Kuk Sung who is director of the Korean side of the council and vice-general manager of the state electric corporation of China Zu Taefeng who is director of the Chinese side of the council.

articles.title: Return of Macao to China hailed
Greetings to Malaysian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Malaysian Foreign Minister 
    Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Datuk Sri Syed Hamid Albar upon his reappointment as Foreign Minister of Malaysia.
   Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will further develop in mutual interests of the two peoples, the message wished him greater success in his responsible work.
